name: Toropiamon
description: Toropiamon is a Vegetation Digimon. Toropiamon inhabit jungles. It is thought to have digivolved into its gaudy appearance by taking in the data of various trees and fruits. The scent from its body, which is like a mixture of all kinds of fruits, is so intense that those who are not used to it will be knocked out by force. The drops secreted from its leaves, which act like wings, are so toxic that they can even dissolve iron.
